job.title: Data Quality Analyst
job.description: stronguWho We ArebrbrustrongClearCut Analytics is a leading provider of retail analytics for CPG brands With over 50B in eCommerce and Amazon sales data analyzed our intelligence delivers actionable insights into todays complex retail marketplace to power successful product innovation optimize crosschannel performance and outmaneuver an expanding set of competitors Beyond ClearCuts technology our team of experts ensure companies are equipped with a roadmap and partner for success in the digital era for consumer goodsbrbrFor 20 years SPINS mission has been to increase the presence and accessibility of natural and organic products to encourage healthier and more vibrant living By leveraging SPINS industryleading proprietary data and analytics our technology enables deeper more engaged relationships between Retailers Brands and Consumers through our platform web and mobile products At the core of our work lies a passion to create a culture of sustainable health amp wellnessbrbrClearCut has chosen SPINS as a strategic partner to drive market acceleration inmarket execution and product development This is a highly strategic investment to accelerate SPINS omnichannel ecommerce strategybrbrstronguWhat You Will DobrbrustrongWe are looking for dynamic and passionate individuals to join our Data team as a strongData Quality Analyst strongto help develop and grow our data and insights offering The team focus is on the complete data quality cycle from logging and auditing the receipt and processing of data to ensuring data deliverables are of the highest quality You will be responsible for the execution of data quality routines This individual will proactively monitor measure analyze execute track and report on data quality issues The Data Quality Analyst will interact with other teams to resolve data quality related issues This position reports to the VP Data and Insightsbrul liTrack and audit data in and out of the businessli liAssist in the processing and verification of data through our internal portalli liIdentify assess monitor document and communicate potential quality issues in the way data is collected stored processed or usedli brulUndertake and Conduct Data Quality Management activities such as but not limited tobrul liIdentify compare and resolve data quality issuesli liEvaluate large dataset for quality and accuracyli liDetermine business impact level for data quality issuesli liDetermine root case for data quality errors and make recommendations for longterm solutionsli liResearch and determine scope and complexity of issues so as to identify steps to fix issueli liDevelop process improvements to enhance overall data qualityli liDevelop and execute data cleanup measuresli liEnsure adherence to data quality standardsli liResolve all internal data exceptions in timely and accurate mannerli liIdentify areas of improvement to achieve data qualityli brbrulstronguWhat You Bringbrustrongul liMinimum of 2 years of hands on mixed experience in technology and processli liMinimum of 2 years of experience with Data Management Data Governance or Data Qualityli liProven experience of having worked and data quality skills inbrul liData Profiling quality rules definitionli liData Discoveryli liData quality measurement and metric generation and aggregation into quality performance indicatorsli liRoot cause analysisli liStrong data analysis skills across multiple source systems of various formatsli liAdvanced MS Office Suite skills especially Excelli liDemonstrated success in managing multiple deliverables concurrently often within aggressive timeframes ability to cope under time pressureli liBeing a team player who works collaboratively and provides coaching and support to transfer technical and data knowledgeli ul li brulstrongWhy SPINSbrbrstrongstronguFor Now We Cant Have Some Of Our Favorite Inoffice Perks plenty Of Snacks Onsite Gym And Bike Storage Weve Continued To Find Ways To Stay True To SPINSbrbrustrongWhen we began working remotely a year ago due to COVID we committed to keeping our healthy and active SPINS culture This remained a high priority for us as we grew our employee population by nearly 20 while we worked remotely We listen to employee feedback as we plan when and how we will return to the office in the futurebrul liVirtual yoga HIIT and Kinstretch classes each weekli liEach employee is allotted paid time to use to volunteer with an organization of their choice and charitable donations are matchedli liStay connected with other SPINS employees for a weekly PELOTON ride togetherli liCEO Connect a monthly informal small group QampA session with our top leader li brulstrongThe SPINS Waybrstrongul listrongDirectstrong  We communicate with clarity honesty and respect in all situations and embrace opportunities to provide solutionoriented feedbackli listrongDeterminedstrong  We are committed to overcoming all obstacles to achieve results We adapt to change seek opportunities to learn and rapidly translate that learning into actionli listrongPassionatestrong  We go above and beyond to help our partners achieve their goals We challenge assumptions and are comfortable forging new pathsli listrongCollaborativestrong  We leave our egos at the door believing that working together we will produce an outcome thats greater than each individual contributionliul
